title: New: Lukid – P
content:
I’ve realised I probably spend more time endlessly rummaging through Lukid’s facebook photos than I do listening to his music. Although insultingly disproportionate to my listening time, I would still recommend checking them out, they’re pretty fucking funny.

Anyway, a brand new cut emerged on Lukid’s soundcloud a couple of days ago, entitled P. It’s a rapturous, stumbling and disemboweled series of sounds that remarkably manages to build to something rather tantalizing in scale, despite its beginnings as essentially a cluster fuck of sound.

stream it below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
